description: This detection excludes known namped pipes accessible remotely and notify on newly observed ones, may help to detect lateral movement and remote exec using named pipes
false_positives: update the excluded named pipe to filter out any newly observed legit named pipe
name: First Time Seen Remote Named Pipe - Zeek
query: (event.dataset:"smb_files" AND file.path:\\\*\\IPC$ AND (NOT (file.path:\\\*\\IPC$ AND file.name.text:("atsvc" OR "samr" OR "lsarpc" OR "winreg" OR "netlogon" OR "srvsvc" OR "protected_storage" OR "wkssvc" OR "browser" OR "netdfs" OR "svcctl" OR "spoolss" OR "ntsvcs" OR "LSM_API_service" OR "HydraLsPipe" OR "TermSrv_API_service" OR "MsFteWds"))))
